msbt.message: Hey, . That's the I gave you, yeah?That's so cool. I feel like I'm a TV fashion person, forcing clothes on other folks! A huh huh huh! WEAR THAT! IT WILL LOOK GOOD! A huh huh huh, just like on TV!
That seems real familiar<10_4 /> Oh, hey. It's the one I gave you!Nice, . You're rocking that outfit. I guess I've got good taste in fashion. Who knew?

I've got an outfit just like that But I dunno where it isMaybe bugs stole it? No, that'd be weird. But sometimes weird stuff happens, ya know? <10_4 />Bugs are weird.<10_7 arg="60" /> Oh, wait! I gave it to you, didn't I? A huh huh huh. <10_4 />Did I get all the bugs out of the pockets?
Check it out! You're wearing the I gave ya as a secret holiday gift!Secret holidays are fun 'cause ya can just make one up on the spot as an excuse to make someone else happy.
Your looks great on your brain bucket! I'm a real cool gift giver, huh?
Theumhead shapeof your head looks real nice with your on it.Man, I'm a great gift giver, huh? Your big round head looks so good right now, . So good.
That looks real good on your head.
Hey, where'd you buy the ?I want my head to look that cool too.
That looks real good next to your big, round head!
, I really dig your !
Your ? Real neat! Yeah, man. Real, real neat.
? , that's good fashion right there, .

, are you wearing ?Me, I like pants that have got an elastic waistband. They're comfy, sure. But they're also real baggy!You can shove a buncha stuff in there real easy! It's like wearing one big pocket! A huh huh huh.
Your are pretty cool.With shoes like those, you can probably jump over things or run real fast, huh?But you can never run away from your troubles, !
Huh?! You designed that ? Neat!You look real cool, walking around in your own design. It's like saying, "Look what I did, world!"

Oh man! Stop the sewing machines and give back the wool! That's a design, yeah?Your ? Obviously an homage to Lydia von McBugwell's faux-polytextile phase.'s doing real good work, reimagining Ms. McBugwell's oeuvre for a new century. Nice job!Huh? Oh, one time my TV got stuck on a fashion channel and I learned all kindsa stuff I can't forget!
, your outfit is real cool!What? from designed it? Wow. That's real neat!A huh huh huh, I wonder if they'd design me something based on , ?
Your 's real springtimey.I can almost smell flowers when I look at you!
Your outfit screams "Summer!"<10_4 /> Could ya ask it to quiet down?
Looking at your fall outfit has made me kinda hungry.
You look warm, . As warm as a cinnamon roll fresh from the oven.
Aren't you melting in that outfit? Oh, I gotcha. You're keeping your coffee warm.
Aren't you freezing? Oh, hang on. I get it! You're doing weather jokes!
Neat! You're wearing ! It looks real good on ya!
What's that you're wearing? ?You're breathtakingly cute in that outfit! Or maybe that's just the hiccups again.
Help! I can't pick which is cuter—you or your .Wait, I know! I'll use math! OK, now I just need to multiply your cuteness by your .That equals, um Hey, how do you multiply someone by their clothes?
Looking good, ! , yeah?Those clothes are so spiffy, ya look like a fancy cake a restaurant's gotta keep in a tall glass case.
Hmm. I don't FEEL any colder when I stand next to you while you wear your .Dang. Here I was hoping I could buy some "cool" clothes and it would be cheaper than air conditioning.
You look sooo cool and snazzy and, uhhappening? Yeah, you HAPPEN in your .Hey, can you teach me how to happen too? I wanna happen someday, !
That looks good!How long have you worn it today? Anything I wear looks like a napkin after a couple hours, !
Nice !You're so fashion-y that even basic clothes look like they cost a lot of money. Way to go, !
How do you do it? How do you look so cool? You're just wearing Man, you really can look good in ANYTHING, can't you? It's like you have magic fashion powers!
Whoa, are you wearing ?I hope you didn't dress up just in case you saw me. You're so cool, you got nothing to prove.
If you look in the dictionary, next to "super gorgeous" there's a picture of your !It takes guts to pull off a look like yours! I'd just look like a walking face-cutout standee if I tried that.
Whoa! You're kinda dazzling in your !Actually, that's super smart. Now if you get lost, you'll be easy to find. Good thinking, !
Are you rocking ? Nice. Looks easy to move in.Watching you move is making me wanna move. It's like, "Oh yeah! I can move!" <10_4 />I forget sometimes.
That's a real rad look on you! Great !Someone on the go has gotta wear stuff like that. Not like pajamas, which are for someone on the stop.
You really like running around and stuff, don't you? I can tell 'cause of your .I can also tell 'cause of how you're always running around and stuff!
Whoa! Are you wearing ?!You're so fancy, a huh huh huh! I dunno how ya do it. I couldn't be that fancy. It looks exhausting!
Where are you off to in your fancy ?You look super sweet in anything, but stuff like that brings out the best in you. Especially next to me!
You look like a different person in your !Um, ARE you a different person? Just in case Hi! I'm , and I like !

You like that outfit a lot, don't you, ? I saw you wearing it the other day!It's kinda funny I remember that, 'cause I can't remember what I wore yesterdayHeck, I don't even recognize any of the crumbs on the clothes I'm wearing right now!

You must really like that outfit to wear it so often.I understand. I wear the same clothes a lot too.If I drop food on my shirt? I can suck the flavor out later. SLUUURP!<10_4 /> I call it "snack echoes."
You're always wearing that .Is it your superhero costume?!
You're really into that , huh? You wear it every day!I get it, though. The less ya think about what you're gonna wear, the more you can think about other stuff!
You really like that outfit, huh? Man, I know how it is. I dig wearing the same stuff all the time too.You don't gotta think about what to wear, and you know where all the good-tasting stains are.
Hey, are you a big fan of Bunny Day or somethin'? Or are you, like, a talking egg?Oh, I hope it's the Bunny Day one
Hey, your outfit is really fancy today. You goin' to some kind of fun event or something?Wait, is it a wedding? Is it MY wedding?! Did I not invite myself?!<10_4 /> Oh. Whew. Close call.
That outfit you're wearing It's like real fruit, !Oh, , I had a dream about huge walking fruit one time Not as delicious as it sounds.

I'm really digging your pirate look today, .I used to want to be a pirate, too, but then I learned some more about them It was disappointing. Did you know that what they do has nothing to do with pie at all?

So you look just like this mermaid I saw one time, A huh huh! Just kidding. I know mermaids aren't real. The very idea of them is pure silliness. A mer, on the other hand—that's, like, the perfect combo.
You look like you're going for a swim. Oh, is THAT what all this wet-suit stuff is for, ? I wondered why anyone would wanna throw an underwater fancy party.

That outfit is like a breath of fresh mountain air, !If I close my eyes, I can smell the pine trees and savory pies, fresh out of the oven. And, oh! What's that? Do I spot behind that rock over there?
I really like what you've got on right now. It's so elegant, !It's what I like to call a "wear a napkin around your neck" outfit.
I don't often get to use the word "dapper," so I'm gonna savor this moment, OK? You look SO good, dapper!
Are those clothes handmade? Whoever sewed 'em must love you a lot!I don't wear the stuff my mom sends me too often. It's the one outfit I don't wanna get crumbs on, y'know?
Whoa! You're all decked out in DAL gear, huh?I didn't know they let you wear that stuff if you don't fly the planes. I learn something new every day!
You look like you're having fun! What a costume!I bet you could rake in the candy on Halloween if you were dressed like that, .
Did you know you look like Santa? I just wanna be sure, .You don't wanna look in the mirror and get excited 'cause Santa's there when it's really just you. Trust me.
Hey, whoa! Is that a soup bowl on your head? Amazing! It's like you're living my dream, !

Good thinking with the pajamas. You never know when a nap might strike!You could be on the beach, in your house, in MY house, shopping, doing taxes, sleeping, What I'm saying is, naps are sneaky, so I'm glad to see you're prepared.
Wow, your clothes are real nice. Hey, I've always wondered somethingDo trendy clothes make licking food stains taste, uhtrendier? Asking for a friend.<10_4 /> I'm actually asking for me. Shh!

Seeing all that Nook Inc. stuff on you is really making me thinkI'm on the Nook Inc. Island Getaway Package, my mortgage is with Nook Inc., and I shop at Nook's CrannyBut I could do SOOO much more! I could buy Nook Inc. clothes, Nook Inc. furniture, get more Nook MilesYeah, looks like I got some shopping to do. Better get to it. Anyway, your clothes are way neat, .
Hey! Look at us, a huh huh huh We're matching! We're both dressed as cats, !Oh, right. I AM a cat.
Meow? Meow, meow meow?Sorry, I don't actually speak cat. Just thought I'd try to fit in with the theme, !
You look so good in all that frog gear. When I first saw you, I was like, "Whoa. Is that me? I look hungry."

That outfit is super realistic. If you were going for frog, you totally nailed it, . Seriously. I wouldn't be surprised if I saw you snap a fly right outta the air using only your tongue. OK, I'd be a little surprised, but mostly impressed.
That's a cool outfit you've got on!Ears: check. Tail: check. Yep! You're in the rabbit club, !Between you and me, you don't HAVE to eat the carrots.
You must be in a rabbity mood today! When I get in a mood like that, I just eat a buncha carrots.I try not to be in that mood too much, 'cause carrots are the worst.
Whoa! Who knew you made such a good bear, !Have you got your hibernation jammies all picked out yet?
You've got a whole bear thing going on today! Did you wake up and hear the call of the wild, ?
You're a better sheep than I am in your !Between you and me, it's the big- horns-on-the-head part that sells it.
You're as fluffy as a real sheep in your .All sheep look like big fluffy beds to me. If I had wool, I'd sleep even more than I do already.
Wow! You look just like I did when I was a little . Except, uh a lot more -like!
You're dressed like a bird! Are you learning to fly? 'Cause I bet you'd be super good at it, !
Ohmigosh I can't believe I'm seeing you in person! You're my HERO!Are you on patrol? Do you have a laser? Do you have a spaceship? Can I get your autograph? A huh huh
Look at you in all of that cool chef gear, !Do you have anything you want me to taste test? Really. I'll taste anything onceor 10 times.
A huh huh huh<10_4 /> Wait. Is it happening again?You're , right? Notsomething else?<10_4 /> WHEEEEEW!
Hey, are you gonna be in a race or something? Please come let me cheer! Please, please, ! I promise I won't just stand there and yell "" into the crowd. I never do that.
Are you dressed up like sushi, or am I just having that dream again?Maybe I should keep my distance until we know for sure
How's it goin', ?Whoops! I mean, Your Majesty. Double whoops! I forgot to use the "royal we," . Ack! We did it again!
Ohmigosh! Are you blasting off for the moon, ?!Well, if you feel like bringing any souvenirs backI've always wanted to taste green cheese, !

Isn't that head part heavy? And it looks kinda cracked. Don't drop it like I dropped my history project!My project was about the time that costume comes from. It was from Hang on The paleolicious period!
Are you playing ninja today, ?They say for every ninja you can see, there's 50 more hiding. Come out, everyone! I have cake!
That face on your shirt is neat, but you know what'd be even neater? A me-faced shirt, ! Yeah!
You're a superhero? I mean, of COURSE you're a superhero! You're in !Hey, ever thought about having sidekick? 'Cause I know a really cool He's named !

Cooooool costume! You look just like the hero of my favorite TV show from when I was little.I had the action figures, the toaster, the bedsheets, the toothpaste, the power drill, the detergent, the ladleIt's too bad they canceled it after only one episode,
Looking good! That must be your favorite outfit, huh?I always know it's you when I see !
Hey, you're wearing the same thing as the last time I saw you. Oh! I didn't mean it like thatIt looks cool and it's totally your style Ugh, why does my brain do this to me,
Hey, you're wearing your favorite outfit again, and I'm wearing my favorite outfit too! Do you ever worry about wearing out your favorite clothes?<10_4 /> I don't!
Something's different about you todaybut I can't figure it out. Oh! It's your whole face thing!I never notice change. Like when my favorite energy soda went off shelves and I slept for a week.
You're looking like a whole new today!Did someone draw on your face or something? That happens to me a lot. Maybe I should sleep less.
That's a real neat look for your face! Are you gonna leave it like that for the rest of your life, ?
